topic: On one hand…on the other hand…
sentence: On one hand, it’s convenient, but on the other hand, it’s time-consuming.

topic: On one hand…on the other hand…
sentence: On one hand, he is very obedient to his wife; on the other hand, he treats his parents badly.

topic: On one hand…on the other hand…
sentence: On one hand,  Jason does everything in the  office;  on the other hand,  he does nothing at home.

topic: On one hand…on the other hand…
sentence: As a teacher, he is very patient in class; but on the other hand, he is not so patient with his own child.
